images.copyright: Burchell's zebras, Rietvlei Nature Reserve, South Africa (© Richard Du Toit/Minden Pictures)
images.title: A dazzling sight
images.caption: Burchell's zebras for International Zebra Day
images.desc: It's International Zebra Day, and we're giving a shout-out to the flashiest animal on the African savanna. It's a day to raise awareness of these distinctive creatures and encourage measures to protect them and their habitat. This group of Burchell's zebras is hanging out at Rietvlei Nature Reserve in South Africa.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
